Name: Use of Color
Description: Don't use presentation that relies solely on color

Name: Contrast (Minimum)
Description: Contrast ratio between text and background is 4.5:1

Name: Non-text Contrast
Description: At least 3:1 on active UI components/essential info graphics

Name: On Focus
Description: Elements do not change when they receive focus

Name: On Input
Description: Elements do not change when they receive input

Name: Name, Role, Value
Description: Build all elements for accessibility (ARIA etc.)

Name: Status Messages
Description: Provide status messages programmatically (roles etc.)

Name: Non-text Content
Description: Provide text alternatives for non-text content

Name: Images of Text
Description: Don't use images of text

Name: Keyboard
Description: Accessible by keyboard only

Name: No Keyboard Trap
Description: Don't trap keyboard users

Name: Character Key Shortcuts
Description: Any shortcuts can: turn off, remap or are active only on focus

Name: Focus Order
Description: Focus should follow a logical order

Name: Focus Visible
Description: Keyboard focus is visible and clear

Name: Pointer Gestures
Description: Provide non-gestural input options for any UI gestures

Name: Pointer Cancellation
Description: Provide cancellation options for single pointer actions

Name: Label in Name
Description: For inputs: accessible name should match the visible label

Name: Error Identification
Description: Clearly identify input errors

Name: Labels or Instructions
Description: Label elements and give instructions

Name: Error Suggestion
Description: Suggest fixes when users make errors

Name: Error Prevention (Legal, Financial, Data)
Description: Reduce the risk of input errors for sensitive data

Name: Meaningful Sequence
Description: Present content in a meaningful order

Name: Sensory Characteristics
Description: Use more than one sense for instructions

Name: Orientation
Description: Allow users to choose their preferred device orientation

Name: Resize text
Description: Text can be resized to 200% without loss of content or function

Name: Reflow
Description: Allow 400% zoom w/o need for horizontal scrolling.

Name: Text Spacing
Description: Allow users to modify text display properties

Name: Content on Hover or Focus
Description: Hover/focus content must be dismissable, hoverable, persistent

Name: Link Purpose (In Context)
Description: Every link's purposes is clear from its context

Name: Multiple Ways
Description: Offer several ways to find pages

Name: Headings and Labels
Description: Use clear headings and labels

Name: Consistent Navigation
Description: Use menus consistently

Name: Consistent Identification
Description: Use icons and buttons consistently

Name: Info and Relationships
Description: Logical structures

Name: Identify Input Purpose
Description: Allow users to leverage autocomplete for common inputs

Name: Bypass Blocks
Description: Provide a 'Skip to Content' link

Name: Page Titled
Description: Helpful and clear page title

Name: Language of Page
Description: Page has a language assigned

Name: Language of Parts
Description: Tell users when the language on a page changes

Name: Parsing
Description: No major code errors

Name: Timing Adjustable
Description: Time limits have user controls

Name: Pause, Stop, Hide
Description: Provide user controls for moving content

Name: Three Flashes or Below Threshold
Description: No content flashes more than three times per second

Name: Motion Actuation
Description: If used: allow user to modify motion actuation requirements.

Name: Audio-only and Video-only (Prerecorded)
Description: Provide an alternative to video-only and audio-only content

Name: Captions (Prerecorded)
Description: Provide captions for videos with audio

Name: Audio Description or Media Alternative
Description: Video with an audio has a second alternative

Name: Captions (Live)
Description: Live videos have captions

Name: Audio Description (Prerecorded)
Description: Users have access to audio description for video content

Name: Audio Control
Description: Don't play audio automatically
